name: Housebound
description:
Housebound is a short experience of horror and paranormal events set in an old house. The game has been created by one person in a few days for Scream Jam 2019,  so may you find bugs and problems while playing.

CONTROLS:

Move: WASD

Mouse movement: Rotate camera / look around

Interact: Follow the screen messages

Zoom: Right mouse button

ESC: Pause Menu

CREDITS:

- HQ Modular Abandoned Mansion (by Chilla's Art)

- Horror FPS KIT (by Thunderwire Studios)

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

- Download the .zip file

- Extract the file (don't change the folder structure)

- Launch the "Housebound.exe" file

- Enjoy!
